document.full_text: general motors co  said on tuesday it will invest $100 million in a new york parts plant that the company and union officials say was kept from closing because workers there agreed to "second-tier" wage levels designed to keep u.s. automakers competitive.
document.title: gm to invest $100 million in new york parts plant
lines_and_colors: general motors co  said on tuesday it will invest $100 million in a new york parts plant that the company and union officials say was kept from closing because workers there agreed to "second-tier" wage levels designed to keep u.s. automakers competitive.
